name: Halls of Montezuma: A Battle History of the United States Marine Corps
overview: Halls of Montezuma: A Battle History of the U.S. Marine Corps is a computer game developed by Strategic Studies Group in 1987 for the Apple II. Ports were later released for the Commodore 64, Amiga, MS-DOS and Apple IIGS. The game is a war simulation game that offers all of the major battles involving the U.S. Marine Corps.
